data.message: I think it is ridiculous that you can decide to move a profile to a page without warning, without consultation of any sort !  Many profiles do so much good helping others, saving lives, raising money and awareness - which is easier from a profile - how do you decide ? On what basis do your make that decision ?  Why not crack down on the 'hate ' pages that cause so much hurt and heartache and leave the good guys doing what they do - helping, caring, saving lives

replies.message: cual es el costo para una pared de 3x3 metros?
George, as in a Dictatorship, you have no say in what other's do to your property, how dare you want to have control over your own page!!!
